sent.orig: To sort (someone) out, however, is something quite different.
Someone always has good mood, but someone never smiles.
sent.trans: 有些人永远都有好心情，而有些人从来不笑。

sent.orig: Why would someone hum around someone instead of speaking to them?
sent.trans: 为什么有些人总在别人周围嚼舌根，而不去跟谈们好好谈谈。

sent.orig: She heard Xiao Li talking with someone.(Xiao Li was talking with someone.)
sent.trans: 她有听见小李在和一个人讲话。

sent.orig: Life always someone for you disservice this time, you do not have to blame someone else.
sent.trans: 生活中总有人会为你帮倒忙，这时，你不用去责怪别人。
